alert.note: Alert for Clay; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 17 at 1:53PM CST until February 17 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CST FOR EASTERN WEBSTER AND NORTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 153 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clarkson, or 14 miles southwest of Montpelier, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Montpelier around 210 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mantee and Walthall. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for central and north central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
